acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle classes with generic Key/Value types
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleClassesWithKeyValueGenericTypes

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type B3wjKfz3gc=333521766966301 and value of type XsqLtov7oY=333521767049741
